raw_comment:
I notice that most kids send text messages to their parents because it's easier and more convenient. Women are at higher percentages than men in this graph. 

I wonder Why aren't the men texting more? Why aren't they making more phone calls? What age range are the people that responded?

This has an impact on my community because we have phones that have access to reaching our parents but if we don't use them we can lose connection and relationships with people close to us. 


Do you not have wifi??
ace_sentences: I notice that most kids send text messages to their parents.
Sending text messages is easier than making phone calls.
Sending text messages is more convenient than making phone calls.
In this graph, women have higher percentages than men.
I wonder why men do not send more text messages.
I wonder why men do not make more phone calls.
I wonder what age range the respondents have.
This situation has an impact on my community.
In my community, people have phones.
These phones have access to reaching our parents.
If we do not use these phones, we can lose connection with our parents.
If we lose connection with our parents, we can lose relationships with people close to us.
I ask whether you have wifi.
